block.p: Courtney Lyn Colodner, the daughter of Merrilee Mesiano Colodner of Riverdale, the Bronx, and Warren Colodner of Manhattan, was married yesterday to Seth Dallaire, a son of June and Gregory Dallaire of Seattle. The Rev. Jay Sidebotham, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony at St. Bartholomew's Church in Manhattan.
The couple graduated from Vassar College, she cum laude.

Courtney Lyn Colodner, the daughter of Merrilee Mesiano Colodner of Riverdale, the Bronx, and Warren Colodner of Manhattan, was married yesterday to Seth Dallaire, a son of June and Gregory Dallaire of Seattle. The Rev. Jay Sidebotham, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony at St. Bartholomew's Church in Manhattan.
The couple graduated from Vassar College, she cum laude.
Mrs. Dallaire, 28, is the senior art director at Wilmer Communications, a marketing agency in Seattle. Her father is a partner in Kirkpatrick & Lockhart, a Manhattan law firm.

Mr. Dallaire, 30, is an account manager in business development at Amazon.com in Seattle. He received an M.B.A. from New York University. His mother teaches the first grade at the Ridgecrest Elementary School in Shoreline, Wash. His father is the managing partner at Garvey, Schubert & Barer, a Seattle law firm.
